{%if doc.type_of_file == "Possession"%} {% endif %} {%if doc.type_of_file != "Possession"%} {% endif %}


{{doc.name}}

Vehicle Possession and Surrender Form
Employee ID {{doc.emp_no or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.name1 or ''}}
Department {{doc.dept or ''}} Designation {{doc.job_title or ''}}
Resident ID Number(QID) {{doc.resident_id_number or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_joining or '')}}
Company {{doc.dept or ''}}
Type of Action {{doc.type_of_file or ''}}
Vehicle No {{doc.plate or ''}} Make {{doc.make or ''}}
Odometer Reading (KM) {{doc.reading or ''}} Vehicle Condition {{doc.vehicle_condition or ''}}
Possession Date {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.possession_date or '')}} Time {{doc.time or '-'}}
what are the bindings have found:

I understand that, I have taken possession of the above-mentioned vehicle in good condition and I hereby agree that, I am responsible for any traffic violation or accidents after the above mentioned date & time and company shall deduct the appropriate fines/ costs from my monthly salary as per the company policy

Authorized by


Signature of Employee

Signature of Dept/ Div Manager
Type of Action

{{doc.type_of_file or ''}}
Vehicle No {{doc.plate_no2 or ''}} Make {{doc.make2 or ''}}
Odometer Reading (KM) {{doc.odometer_reading2 or ''}} Vehicle Condition {{doc.vehicle_condition2 or ''}}
Surrender Date {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.surrender_date or '')}} Time {{doc.time2 or '-'}}

I understand that, I am surrendering the above vehicle to Admin Dept. and I hereby agree that, I am responsible for any traffic violation or accidents during the period before surrender and company shall deduct the appropriate fines/ costs from my monthly salary as per the company policy



Signature of Employee

Date
For Office Use
Verified by – HR & Admin AssistantApproved by – HR & Admin Manager




Note: The condition of the vehicle needs to be checked by the Auto technician and Admin Dept. shall do receive and handover function only
name: Vehicle Possession Form
